regen.absent_element: privacy assurance when displaying grade details
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that grade details, averages, and overall scores are displayed only to relevant users, maintaining privacy at all times.

regen.absent_element: privacy measures for displaying grade information
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that all grade information accessed and displayed is only visible to authorized users, utilizing authentication and encryption to protect user privacy.

regen.absent_element: ensuring privacy when displaying grade details, averages, and overall scores
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure privacy by only displaying grade details, averages, and overall scores to users with the necessary permissions.

label: No other actor should be able to view another one's grades except the course administrator.
absence: no mention of prohibiting anyone other than administrators from viewing others' grades
